long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes Facebook's "Add Members" option to "Add More Dudes" so that it's easier than ever to add dudes!

v1.6: small bugfix
v1.5: fixed "See More" when adding dudes
v1.4: changes already-added members to dudes
v1.3: changes "Add Member" button to "Add Dude" and should be a little more efficient
v1.2: also changes "Members" and "Suggested Members" to "Dudes" and "Suggested Dudes"
v1.1: actually works
